text: Ezhumattoor is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala, India. ==Demographics== India census, Ezhumattoor had a population of 11,423 with 5,540 males and 5,883 females. == Economy == The main occupation of people is farming. The major crops are coconut, tapioca and pepper. ==References== Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Ezhumattoor
